message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement that works better for both of us. I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  To reach a middle ground, I can offer it to you for $18,000. This reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your interest.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that we could find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $15,000 for the product.
